channel.title: Git on IT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on IT Blog

item.title: Git
item.description: Git Git Documentation Basics master : default branch origin : upstream repository by default head : current branch head^ : parent branch of the current branch head~~ or head~2 : n-th parent of the current branch Commands git init [project-name] git clone [url] <dir> git remot­e add origi­n git@g­ithub.com:[user]/[project].git git pull git push git push -f # Force push git branch # List all local branches git branch -r # List all remote branches git branch -a # List local and remote branches git branch -D [branch] # Delete a branch git branch -m [branch] # Rename current branch to [branch] git branch [branch] # Create a branch git checkout [branch] git checkout -b [branch] # Create a new branch and checkout the new branch.
